definition: Your presence brings light to my humble dwelling/see also 蓬蓽生光|蓬荜生光[peng2 bi4 sheng1 guang1]
fleabane (family Asteraceae)/disheveled/classifier for luxuriant plants, smoke, ashes, campfires: clump, puff
surname Peng
bean/pulse
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
splendor/to shine upon

sentences.english: All the legends have been great - they've all been brilliant with me.
sentences.chinese: 每个传奇球星都是伟大的，他们让我蓬荜生辉。

sentences.english: Unusual and creative beds that will make a great addition to any bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 与众不同而又富有创意的床会让每个卧室都蓬荜生辉。

definition: we are honored by your presence
(polite) excuse me for not going out to meet you
the blessing of three lifetimes (idiom)/(courteous language) it's my good fortune...
my humble home
imperial chariot/(fig.) emperor/(polite) you
to do sb the honor (of attending etc)/to put in an appearance/to show up
I have been looking forward to meeting you for a long time (idiom)
lit. I'm ashamed and dare not (accept the honor); fig. I do not deserve your praise./You flatter me too much.
(polite) do me the honor
honorific: I've long looked forward to meeting you./It's an honor to meet you at last.
to find time to do sth in the midst of pressing affairs
overwhelmed by favor from superior (humble expr.)
nice to meet you
infrequent visitor
great kindness/magnificent hospitality
to be indebted (to sb)
